現われ: (あらわれ) - embodiment; manifestation; materialization; materialisation; expression; indication

現を抜かす: (うつつをぬかす) - to be infatuated; to be hooked on

現人: (うつしおみ) - man of this world/the real world/temporal things; (空蝉, 虚蝉 only) cast-off cicada shell/cicada
現人神: (あらひとがみ) - living god (term for the emperor); miracle-working god (who appears as the occasion demands)
現今: (げんこん) - the present (day or age)
現代: (gendai) - nos dias de hoje, era moderna, tempos modernos, atual

現代アート: (げんだいアート) - modern art; contemporary art

現代文明: (げんだいぶんめい) - modern civilization; modern civilisation
現代新書: (げんだいしんしょ) - a series of paperbacks published since 1964 by Kodansha
現代版: (げんだいばん) - modern version (e.g. of Italian Renaissance architecture)
現代生活: (げんだいせいかつ) - contemporary life; present-day life
現代用語: (げんだいようご) - word of recent origin; neologism; recent word; modern term
現代社会: (げんだいしゃかい) - modern society

現代風: (げんだいふう) - modern style; modernness
